legend.pwclass: A unique identifier for a password policy.
legend.minNonAlpha: The minimum number of characters that need to be a different case. For example, a value of 1 means at least one letter needs to be uppercase if the rest are lowercase.
legend.minReuse: The minimum number of previous passwords to retain to prevent password reuse.
legend.minDigits: The minimum number of digits in a password.
legend.minLength: The minimum length of a password.
legend.minLetters: The minimum number of letters in a password.
legend.maxRepeating: The maximum allowed number of repeating characters.
